body_html:
@bgerazov glad to hear you're enjoying it, and welcome to PyTorch!

In general, we like to use our GitHub issues more for bug reports and the forums for more general questions. Since you posted both here and on the forums, I'll reply to your post on the forums so we can have a longer discussion.
body_text:
@bgerazov glad to hear you're enjoying it, and welcome to PyTorch!
In general, we like to use our GitHub issues more for bug reports and the forums for more general questions. Since you posted both here and on the forums, I'll reply to your post on the forums so we can have a longer discussion.
body:
@bgerazov glad to hear you're enjoying it, and welcome to PyTorch!

In general, we like to use our GitHub issues more for bug reports and the forums for more general questions. Since you posted both here and on the forums, I'll reply to your [post on the forums](https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/cuda-runtime-error-4-when-pushing-model-to-cuda/12546) so we can have a longer discussion.
